body:
At some point we decided that XPI files should have their own listing and upload/edit page so that users can upload XPIs separately from creating opt-out study recipes. The arguments form can then use a select input populated by uploaded XPIs.

Longer-term, we may use this to add peer review for uploaded XPIs, and we also will probably add a better input for selecting an uploaded XPI than a select box.

We may also forego a listing for the initial version of this and just use the DRF page or the API directly for uploading XPIs, so as to avoid creating a new listing in the control interface right before we work on hooking up a replacement UI rewrite.
